AdapterInterface

interface AdapterInterface implements CacheItemPoolInterface

Interface for adapters managing instances of Symfony's CacheItem.

Methods

CacheItem getItem($key)

{@inheritdoc}
Traversable|CacheItem[] getItems(array $keys = array())

{@inheritdoc}
